ing: 1 teaspoon chia seeds, or to taste (optional)
des: "A thick and creamy skinny Black Forest smoothie made with blended chocolate, cherry, milk, and spinach. A delicious smoothie packed with antioxidants and fiber. The perfect post-workout smoothie that doubles as a dessert!"
ins: Place baby spinach, cherries, almond milk, rolled oats, cocoa powder, and sweetener in a blender. Blend until smooth, about 2 minutes. Pour into a glass and top with chia seeds.
